EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Daniel, Thanks for the update. I will continue to reach out. Take care!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Daniel Buchanan [mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com] Sent: Saturday, May 19, 2012 9:41 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Sara, Thank you for continuing to follow up with Bahi. I haven't heard any further updates from him since the phone conversation he and I had over 2 weeks ago about MBO Partners' services. He seemed very anxious to get someone started to help his department when I first signed the contract with Intratek Computer, but I have to say at this point I'm wondering how serious his need for help actually is, as it's been extremely difficult to get him on the phone and his updates have been slow and far between. I would encourage you to continue to follow up with him, and hopefully together we can get him back in the game. Please let me know if you have any further updates or questions. Kind regards,Daniel Buchanan (p) 321-821-7518 (e) dbuchanan12@ymail.comFrom: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> To: "Daniel Buchanan (dbuchanan12@ymail.com)" <dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 4:59 PM Subject: FW: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Daniel, I am going to follow up with Bahi again but before I do I wanted to see if you had heard anything from him or if you had any updates. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2012 6:27 PM To: 'bghobbeh@intrapc.com' Cc: Daniel Buchanan (dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>) Subject: FW: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Importance: High Hi Bahi, Hope you are doing well. I wanted to follow up on our call and see if there was anything you needed from me to facilitate the paperwork. Daniel is interested in running this project though MBO Partners and again this is advantageous to your firm for my reasons which are details on this a short one page collateral <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1NMtk935f2Xc%2FvNhjjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. Please let me know how I can help. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 2:25 PM To: 'bghobbeh@intrapc.com' Cc: Daniel Buchanan (dbuchanan12@ymail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1NMtk935f2Xc%2FvNhjjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>) Subject: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Importance: High Dear Bahi , My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by Daniel Buchanan. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce. We have also put together a short one page collateral that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
